description:
Located in the heart of Marseille, just a 10-minute walk from the famous V√©lodrome Stadium, this renovated studio offers a unique opportunity to enjoy the city. With its ideal address at 30 Avenue de Mazargue, you'll be close to many shops, restaurants, and local attractions.

With a size of 14m2, this studio is optimally designed to maximize the available space. It features a shared bathroom and toilet with another studio, providing an affordable option without compromising comfort. Cleanliness and maintenance of the common areas are a priority.

One of the main highlights of this studio is its exceptional brightness. The large windows flood the space with natural light, creating a pleasant and warm atmosphere. You'll instantly feel at home in this welcoming environment.

For cooking enthusiasts, a fully equipped kitchenette is at your disposal. You'll have access to an induction cooktop, microwave, and oven, allowing you to prepare meals according to your preferences.

If you're traveling by car, you'll appreciate the secure parking available in the residence, ensuring peace of mind during your travels.

Moreover, the accommodation is well-served by public transportation. It will only take you 20 minutes by public transport to reach the beaches and the magnificent Notre-Dame de la Garde Basilica, one of Marseille's iconic symbols offering breathtaking views of the city.

For more informarion, please contact me

Don't miss this opportunity to have an unforgettable experience in one of Marseille's most sought-after neighborhoods. Book your stay in this comfortable studio now and fully enjoy everything the city has to offer!
